General.Name: Connexa Sports Technologies Inc.
General.Description: Connexa Sports Technologies Inc. develops a matchmaker application platform that focuses on creating life partnerships for single adults that results in love and marriage. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Mong Kok, Hong Kong.
